application

Class Subject

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Subject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Verwaltung

    public abstract class Subject
extends Object
    Class is an abstract Subject-Class that provides methods for Observer-Classes.
    Author:
    domin
